description: Take a 10-minute walk outside to clear your mind.
Eat a healthy breakfast with fruits or oats.
Send a message to a friend you haven’t spoken to in a while.

Practice deep breathing exercises for 5 minutes.

Compliment someone or give them positive feedback.
Write down three things you are grateful for today.

Include a vegetable in every meal today.
Spend 20 minutes journaling your thoughts or feelings.
Try a new healthy recipe today, focusing on whole foods.
Call a friend or family member for a 20-minute conversation.
Set a small personal goal and work towards it for 30 minutes.

Cook a meal without using processed foods or takeout.

Follow a clean eating plan for an entire day, avoiding processed foods and sugar.
Plan a face-to-face meeting with someone you haven’t seen in a while.
Spend an hour learning a new skill or language.
Perform a digital detox for a whole day, avoiding social media and emails.
Prepare a completely plant-based meal for the day.
Volunteer for a cause you believe in or help someone in need.
Take on a personal project and dedicate a few hours to making progress.

Fast for 12-16 hours, depending on your comfort level, and focus on mindful eating when you break your fast.

Commit to a week of no procrastination and focus on completing tasks as soon as possible.

Try a full day of intermittent fasting and focus on a healthy eating window.
